name: The Light Keeps Us Safe
description: THE LIGHT KEEPS US SAFE is a procedurally-generated apocalypse in which only The Light can save us. Use stealth and evasion to avoid terrifying machines that patrol the desolate world, and employ the powers of Light to unpick their deadly traps.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit Version) Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.7GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 TI or AMD Radeon R9370 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit OS
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit Version) Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.2 GHz + Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 390X Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit OS
